overview: Google is an American multinational technology corporation focused on search, AI, cloud computing, and consumer electronics, operating as a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc.
culture_signals: High marks for culture and values (4.3/5)
recent_news: Launching AR glasses in 2026 with Android XR operating system
Completed February 2026 Google Discover Core Update
Deepening Gemini AI integration across products
Expanding Pixel product line and Google TV features

Excitement about Gemini AI integration across products
Google's position as the leader handling 70%+ of global search
